mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(username, password, profile_photo, level, email, phone, profile, sex) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{profilePhoto}, #{level}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{profile}, #{sex})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, profile_photo = #{profilePhoto}, level = #{level}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, profile = #{profile}, sex = #{sex}, register_date = #{registerDate} WHERE id = #{id};
